transcript.text: well shabbat shalom it is the 16th

49th sabbath year in the 50 year cycle
began back in the back in early april
hallelujah man it has been quite a week
quite a trying week lots of struggles
and trials throughout the week but I
just feel blood to start reading in in
John chapter 15 I am The True Vine and
my father is the husbandmen every branch
in me that beareth not fruit he takes
away and every branch that bears fruit
he perjures it that it may bring forth

in me and I in you as the branch cannot

abide in me I am the vine you are the

without me you can do nothing if a man
abide not me he is cast forth as a
branch and is withered and men gather

they are burnt if you abide in me and my

you will and it shall be done unto you
hiren is my father glorified that you
bear much fruit so shall you be my

have I love you continued ye and my love
if you keep my Commandments you shall
abide in my love even as I have kept my

love these things have I spoken unto you
that my joy might remain in you and that
your joy might be full this is my

I have loved you and greater love has no
man than this that a man lay down his
life for his friends
you are my friends if you do whatsoever
I command you henceforth I call you not

of my father I've made known unto you
you have not chosen me but I have chosen

one toward another loving each other as

know that's kind of interesting thing if

Canadian friends actually sent this
first to me yesterday last night
actually as the Shabbat was beginning
says a new commandment I give unto you

now what was the new commandment because

having patience and bearing one with
